price: 158 mais Allah l’a élevé vers Lui. Allah est Tout-Puissant et infiniment Sage.
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
